SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AssetSetter
AssetSetter class that will take care of initiating static/moving objects needed in the game window.
CollisionChecker
This class checks the characters' position on the map and sees if it is touching any tiles that you should not walk through
Entity
The base class for any entities on the map Includes their sprites, location, and if they are able to collide with other entities
GamePanel
This class is where the main logic will go such as how the game will continually run and will update what is currently on screen.
KeyHandler
Class that will take input from the keyboard and move the character accordingly
Main
 
MainCharacterTV
The main character class that will take care of drawing and updating.
MON_ScrewDude
The ScrewDude class that draw the screwDude and defines how it moves
monsterEntity
monsterEntity class that takes care of any monster's drawing and updating.
MovingObject
Extends the basic Entity class and adds movement speed and walking image
OBJ_Battery
The battery class that draws and updates the battery
OBJ_Door
Door object that will be used to leave the level
OBJ_Hole
Hole object that acts as a trap for the main character If main character touches it, the game will end
OBJ_KeyCard
Keycard object that is required to leave the level
OBJ_Life
Health bar class that will change the image accordingly based on the player's health
StaticObject
Objects that don't move such as power-ups and traps Extends the Entity class
Tile
Tile class that will contain the image and if the Entities.tile can be walked through
TileManager
Will manage the map and all the tiles it will contain.
UI
UI class that takes care of UI part of this game.
Wall
Wall entity
WallManager
Class that will handle the wall and their hitboxes
